00000000000000000000000000000000
00000100000000010000000000000100 //LI $1 4			Carrega 4 no $1
00000100000000100000000000000011 //LI $2 3			Carrega 3 no $2
00000000001000100001100000000101 //mult $1, $2, $3		$1 * $2 = $3
00011100000000110000000000000001 //SW $3 $1			Guarda o conteúdo de $3 no endereço 1 da RAM
00011000000001000000000000000001 //LW $1 $4			Carrega o conteúdo do endereço 1 da RAM no $4
00000100010000100000000000000001 //addi $2, 1 		Soma $2 com 1 ou seja : 3 + 1 = 4
00001000001000100000000000000001 //beq $1 $2 1		Compara $1 com $2, se for igual, pula a proxima linha
